price: Ka ce: Shin kuma, in gaya muku mafi alhẽri daga wannan? Akwai gidãjen Aljanna a wurin Ubangiji sabõda waɗanda suka bi Shi da taƙawa, kõguna suna gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, suna madawwama a cikinsu, da mãtan aure tsarkakakku, da yarda daga Allah. Kuma Allah Mai gani ne ga bãyinSa.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ أَؤُنَبِّئُكُم بِخَيۡرٖ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمۡۖ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَأَزۡوَٰجٞ مُّطَهَّرَةٞ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul a-unabbi-ukum bikhayrin min dhālikum lilladhīna ittaqaw ʿinda rabbihim jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa-azwājun muṭahharatun wariḍ'wānun mina al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
